# R Packages

**CRAN**

* [myownrobs](https://cran.r-project.org/package=myownrobs): AI coding agent for RStudio.

* [chatgpt](https://cran.r-project.org/package=chatgpt): Interface to 'ChatGPT' from R.

* [rco](https://cran.r-project.org/package=rco): The R Code Optimizer.

* [autokeras](https://cran.r-project.org/package=autokeras): R Interface to ['AutoKeras'](https://autokeras.com/).

* [malvinas](https://cran.r-project.org/package=malvinas): Datasets related to Argentine war veterans in the Islas Malvinas.

**Bioconductor**

* [MIGSA](https://bioconductor.org/packages/MIGSA/): Massive and Integrative Gene Set Analysis.

**GitHub**

* [shinyParallel](https://github.com/jcrodriguez1989/shinyParallel): Run Shiny Applications in a Multi-Session Mode.

* [renv-installer](https://github.com/jcrodriguez1989/renv-installer): Simple R version management.

* [heyshiny](https://github.com/jcrodriguez1989/heyshiny): New `shiny` input that translates audio to text.

* [shinyWYSIWYG](https://github.com/jcrodriguez1989/shinyWYSIWYG): Shiny What You See Is What You Get (WYSIWYG) editor.

* [interactingan](https://github.com/jcrodriguez1989/interactingan): Interactive Presentation Ninja.

* [rflights](https://github.com/jcrodriguez1989/rflights): Query Plane Tickets using the '[Kiwi](https://www.kiwi.com)' API.
